LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PlastidResolving.label: plastid resolving
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_PlastidResolving.description: Disassembled to obtain the special mechanical body processing method in reverse.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldLite.label: neko shield lite
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldLite.description: A projectile-repulsion device. It will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, alse against melee attacks or heat.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldPro.label: neko shield pro
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldPro.description: A projectile-repulsion device. It will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, alse against melee attacks or heat.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_ULAlloy.label: UL-Alloy
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_ULAlloy.description: A metal with a special crystal structure that is very light in weight and easy to process.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_StromaEnergyCell.label: stroma cell
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_StromaEnergyCell.description: A special crystal structure, this could storage much energy, but it also could be explosived.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_GatherLink.label: gather link
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_GatherLink.description: The special stored energy is released according to a certain power by focusing.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsWeapon.label: tactics weapon
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_TacticsWeapon.description: Deconstruct mechanical bodies to study special weapons.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_ArcanerArmor.label: arcaner armor
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_ArcanerArmor.description: Deconstruct mechanical bodies to study special armors.
